title: Is Daddy Biden Going To Forgive My Student Debt?
description:
On today’s Loose Change presented by Public.com, Berna is back with Yanely Espinal to go further into the debt conversation they started earlier this week. They talk through the right ways to approach paying off your debt, and how depending on your situation, different strategies might be right for you. They also get into the possibility of student loan forgiveness and how to plan for the future without leaving yourself in a tough position. Make sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to stay up to date with the podcast and submit your questions!
Thanks again to our presenting sponsor Public.com! Visit public.com/betches to sign up and get started today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
